amendment.description: Section 214(d) of the Foreign Relations Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 2003 (Public Law 107-228) concerns "Record of Place of Birth as Israel for Passport Purposes".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Weiner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
